arguments.text: In today’s rapidly evolving market, companies must rethink how they source, produce, and deliver goods. This article outlines six core strategies that enable a resilient, low‑carbon supply chain: 1) Circular procurement reduces waste by reusing materials; 2) Supplier transparency improves risk management; 3) Renewable energy integration cuts emissions; 4) Digital twins provide real‑time optimization; 5) Collaborative logistics lower costs; 6) Robust metrics and reporting drive continuous improvement. Each approach is supported by case studies and practical implementation steps.
